response.overview: This spring break, the Girls Gone Wild Beach House was raided by Florida authorities. Arrests were made, footage was confiscated, and all was lost, or so everyone thought. But just before the bust, we were able to make copies of some of the footage and now we bring it to you.In GIRLS GONE WILD: THE SEIZED VIDEO, you`ll get all the hottest action that the authorities didn`t want you to see. It`s the sexiest young college coeds doing what they do best in the clubs, on the beach, and who knows where else. As a special bonus, we`ll even take you to the back room and show you the footage that the VH-1 special tried so desperately to hide. It`s all here for you ... raw, real, and uncut!
response.title: Girls Gone Wild: Seized Video
